title: Navy SEAL
desc:
Post 27
***Tactical Assault* (1x, Charge 90%)**
Rampage attack your target and attack whoever your target visits. You cannot accumulate more than 2 ammo for this ability.
***Hypervigilance** (2x)*
Attack anyone who visits you.
***Professional Restraint** (Passive)*
If you attack a Town member, you will only do so with half your usual attack power. If you kill a Town member, you will be forced to vote against yourself during the following day phase (this is only revealed if you are lynched).
***Bulletproof Vest** (Passive)*
On nights you use Tactical Assault or Hypervigilance, your defense power doubles.
